title: Dabbe: Curse of the Jinn
review: Just terrible, and yet this has good user reviews online and I found it in multiple lists of the scariest movies. I suspect that it's been promoted online by proud Turks, paid influencers, or maybe just people who haven't seen many modern western films and are happy to have something in the genre in their native language. Some of the jump scares are so amateurish, like screamer videos you might have seen on the internet in 2006. The camera shakes and someone screams into the microphone. I'm giving it a shock rating of 0 because although it has plenty of these scares, they are the worst of any horror movie I can think of. There are many more films in this series and I won't see any of them.
